com.linecorp.armeria.server.http.jetty

Class JettyServiceBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linecorp.armeria.server.http.jetty.JettyServiceBuilder

  • public final class JettyServiceBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builds a JettyService. Use JettyService.forServer(String, Server) if you have a configured Jetty Server instance.

    • Constructor Summary

      Sets the default hostname of the Jetty Server.
